title: Full Show (Chargers beat Russ and Broncos on MNF, NBA season begins tonight, Dak medically cleared to return)
description:
00:00 Chargers beat Broncos in OT 19-16
22:12 Pat Bev downplays Russ situation with the Lakers huddle
53:48 Defending champion Warriors host Lakers in NBA season opener tonight
1:06:27 Dak expected to return for Lions game this Sunday
1:20:28 Westbrook will play in Lakers season opener tonight despite injury
1:30:03 Von Miller doubles down on OBJ to Bills prediction
1:37:37 Brady: "It's a bad day when there's more F-bombs than touchdowns"
1:49:16 Ravens 3-3 on season after blowing 10 point lead to Giants
1:54:12 NBA season begins tonight
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
